name: Chess Tournament
description: Put your chess skills to the test! In this exciting challenge, players will compete in a structured tournament, advancing through rounds and facing diverse opponents. Strategy, focus, and adaptability are key to claiming victory.

name: Basketball Tournament
description: Basketball tournament will be conducted in Meraz this year for all the college and university students in chhattisgarh. Assemble your 7 players squad to compete with the best teams this year.

name: Volleyball Tournament
description: Spike Your Way to Victory! Gather your team, hone your strategy, and bring your A-game to the court. This tournament promises intense rallies, thrilling saves, and spectacular spikes as players compete for ultimate glory!

name: Table Tennis
description: Table Tennis tournament will be conducted in Meraz this year for all the college and university students in chhattisgarh. A game which provides a sport and work environment in which all individuals are treated with respect and dignity.  Each individual is motivated to participate and work in an environment which promotes equal opportunities and prohibits discriminatory practices.
tagline: Table Tennis: A Game of Skill and A Test of Will!

name: Power Lifting & Fitness
description: Power lifting and general fitness is a challenging competition conducted in Meraz for this year for all college and university students in Chhattisgarh. This competition provides a platform to showcase your strength and break some PRâ€™s. We will have bench-press , deadlift and pull-up challenges and participants can participate individually. Every person is encouraged to engage and contribute in a setting that fosters equal opportunities and prevents any form of discrimination.
tagline: Strength Unleashed: Where Power Meets Passion
